definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: On the other hand, the cost of maintaining social order is rising.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，维护社会秩序的成本在上升。

sentences.english: Lack of knowledge, on the other hand, can be deadly.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，缺乏知识可能是致命的。

sentences.english: On the other hand, you might get ripped off since you don't know the seller .
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，你可能会被敲竹杠，因为你不知道卖方。

sentences.english: Getting it to civilization is another.
sentences.chinese: 让它融入现代文明是另一方面。

sentences.english: Signification, on the other hand, comes into play in the Vorstellung.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，真实意义是在观念的领域运作。

sentences.english: For another, there are also some differences between high school life and college school.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，高中生活和大学又有所不同。

sentences.english: Individual investors, on the other hand, are not so surprised at Hou's hasty retreat.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，散户们对侯宁的急流勇退并不感觉奇怪。

sentences.english: The next area to question is the whelping of the puppies.
sentences.chinese: 问题的另一方面就是幼崽的。

sentences.english: Another dimension to consider is how variable the service invocation is.
sentences.chinese: 要考虑的另一方面是调用服务的变数。

sentences.english: But another is the fact that Paul fears for the lost.
sentences.chinese: 但另一方面则是保罗为失落的人而感到惧怕。

sentences.english: Rafting can be exciting, but on the other hand, it can be dangerous sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 乘筏漂流令人激动，但另一方面它有时也是危险的。

sentences.english: On the other hand, Christian monotheism was an innovation.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，基督教一神论，是一种创新。

sentences.english: Man United, on the other hand, were looking ominous.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，曼联看起来是一个恶兆。

sentences.english: Otherwise, compensations were the thing here.
sentences.chinese: 这些缺点却在另一方面得到了补偿。

sentences.english: The bull artist, on the other hand, cares nothing for truth or falsehood.
sentences.chinese: 扯淡艺术家，另一方面，丝毫不关心真实或谎言。

sentences.english: Charles W I agree. On the other hand, qing was very lucky. ?
sentences.chinese: 我同意。另一方面来说清是非常幸运吗？

definition: therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
